text: I need to do a log plot on the y axis, but I have some values 0 and that's messing with the yaxis = :log option. Any suggestions to do this more neatly?

elements.text: I need to do a log plot on the y axis, but I have some values 0 and that's messing with the yaxis = :log option. Any suggestions to do this more neatly?

text: I find it frustrating that that doesn’t just work, but you can do something like `newdata = replace(data, 0 => NaN)`, since Plots.jl will ignore NaNs
